text: John Cooper (born October 15, 1956) is an American businessman who was the mayor of Nashville, Tennessee from 2019 to 2023. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He is the brother of former U.S. representative Jim Cooper, who represented Tennessee's 5th congressional district. On January 31, 2023, Cooper announced that he would not run for reelection in the 2023 Nashville mayoral election. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Nashville, Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Cooper (Tennessee politician)
